description:
Beautifully constructed, the Adirondack is proof that fashion and function can coexist in a winter boot. The upper is full-grain leather with a suede shaft that can be flipped up for maximum warmth or folded down, exposing the luxe wool lining. Fully waterproof construction and lightweight synthetic insulation offer comfort in sub-zero situations. A foam midsole and winter-optimized tread provide the support and traction you need to enjoy your winter day-to-day.

  • Waterproof leather uppers over a waterproof bootie
  • Insulated lining blends 10mm soft wool UGGpure™ and 8mm with Sherpa fleece
  • Warm 17mm UGGplush™ wool and lyocell insole conforms to your foot
  • Suede shaft can be rolled up to 30cm or down to ankle height
  • 200g synthetic insulation is warm and lightweight
  • Supportive EVA midsole
  • Durable, high-friction rubber outsole
  • UGG rates these boots to -32°C
name: UGG Adirondack Tall Winter Boots - Women's
